title: Person of Interest - That's the root style (05x06)
author: POI - Best Of
comment: I've never been one to say "...all I needed in life was to see X do Y", but actually, all I did really need in life was to see Root swoop in on a black horse and rescue a lovely lady.

I'm looking for the scenes where root was hearing the Machine in her head, and would start out on an assignment not fully knowing what tools she would need, but doing whatever she heard along the way.  I think most happened after their headquarters was in the underground subway car, not the library.  Thanks!
All root shaw scenes from start to end season wise
Amy Acker can take me away on a horse or motorcycle any day.
This episode felt like the show hadn't yet got its cancelation notice yet.
description:
- Extract from season 5 episode 6
